RAW.SOURCE:
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------* *& Report ZAPLINK_EXTRACTOR *& *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* *& *& *&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
REPORT ZAPLINK_EXTRACTOR.
PARAMETERS: p_pack TYPE ZAPLINK_EXTRACTOR=>TD_PACKAGE DEFAULT 'ZAPLINK', p_path type ZAPLINK_EXTRACTOR=>TD_DIRECTORYNAME default 'Z:\SAP\Google Code\zaplink'.
data o_extract type ref to ZAPLINK_EXTRACTOR.
CREATE OBJECT o_extract. CALL METHOD o_extract->do_extraction EXPORTING target_dir = p_path package = p_pack.

*&---------------------------------------------------------------------* *& Report ZAPLINK_EXTRACTOR *& *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* *& *& *&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
REPORT ZAPLINK_EXTRACTOR.
PARAMETERS: p_pack TYPE ZAPLINK_EXTRACTOR=>TD_PACKAGE DEFAULT 'ZAPLINK', p_path type ZAPLINK_EXTRACTOR=>TD_DIRECTORYNAME default 'Z:\SAP\Google Code\zaplink'.
data o_extract type ref to ZAPLINK_EXTRACTOR.
CREATE OBJECT o_extract. CALL METHOD o_extract->do_extraction EXPORTING target_dir = p_path package = p_pack.

ITEM.ENTRY: ZAPLink : Extract all package to files
